name: George Escapes The Factory
description:
This is a platformer game where you play as a man named George who fell asleep in the factory where he works. The security guy didn't notice him and locked the door, so you have to find the way out and learn the truth about this factory. It's not ready yet.

Versions:

Version 1.0.0: There are just 2 levels - the first level is  a tutorial level, and the second level doesn't have much content, just 2 zombies.

Version 1.0.1: Expanded level 1, and made it so that you have to collect 4 keys before you can pass through the door, Level 2 hasn't changed, and you don't need any keys in order to pass through the door in level 2.

To-do list:

1. Add more content to the second level so it won't look so dull;

2. Add more enemies;

3. Implement a coin system;

4. Add more levels;

5. Add a story;

6. Add crouching.
